author: Special Correspondent
text:
A 23-year-old man, believed to be mentally ill, stabbed a policeman in Chetpet on Tuesday evening.

According to police, the man had called the police control room and said he had all the money in connection with the income tax raid on a private hospital. The police went to his house and brought him to the police station. As they were making inquiries, the man’s father came in and told the police that his son was mentally ill, and took him home. The man called the police again. This time, Mahesh, a policeman, was sent to his home. As Mahesh was trying to take the man to the station, he stabbed him with a knife.

The policeman has been admitted to a private hospital, and the father and son are absconding.
title: Policeman stabbed
